author: Tom Warren
title: Google Cloud’s customer chief returns to Microsoft as head of security
description: Microsoft has a new head of security. Hayete Gallot, who left Microsoft in October 2024 to become the president of Google Cloud's customer experience, is returning to the software giant as the executive vice president of security, reporting directly to CEO Sa…
content: Hayete Gallot previously spent nearly 16 years at Microsoft in senior leadership roles across engineering and sales. Hayete Gallot previously spent nearly 16 ye… [+2933 chars]
